name: io.github.dimitar-grigorov/mcp-file-tools
title: MCP File Tools
description: File operations with legacy encoding support (CP1251, CP1250, KOI8-R, ISO-8859-x).

tools.name: read_text_file
tools.description: Read files with automatic encoding detection and conversion to UTF-8

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List files and directories with optional glob pattern filtering

tools.name: detect_encoding
tools.description: Auto-detect file encoding with confidence score and BOM detection

tools.name: list_allowed_directories
tools.description: Returns the list of directories this server is allowed to access

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory

tools.name: directory_tree
tools.description: Get a recursive tree view of files and directories as JSON

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a glob pattern

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write files with encoding conversion from UTF-8

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename files and directories

tools.name: edit_file
tools.description: Make line-based edits to a text file with diff output
